definitions.definition: One of the components of a compound leaf.

definitions.example: The new leaflets at the end of the branch were a lighter shade of green than the mature leaves.

definitions.definition: A small sheet of paper containing information, used for dissemination of said information, often an advertisement.
definitions.example: A leaflet had been left under the car's windshield wiper.

definitions.definition: A flap of a valve of a heart or blood vessel.

definitions.example: A sidewalk preacher gave an impassioned sermon while an assistant leafleted those who stayed to listen.
During the summer, Peter earned some extra cash by leafleting for a local pizza delivery restaurant.
